name: Cooking with demons
description:
Controls: Left Mouse Button - MOVE

                      Right Mouse Button - DROP

 Game for mini jam 94: baking. This game is about a monster who is baking kids(and other food)and giving it to his clients. Controls aren't that good because of jam's limitation. I hope you'll like it <3

I used this asset in my game: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
